text: Marvel's Agent Carter is an American TV series and the second series of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The series was created by Christopher Markus and Stephen McFeely and was on ABC from January 6, 2015 to March 1, 2016. Hayley Atwell stars in the series, returning as Agent Peggy Carter from the MCU movies. The series was produced by Marvel Television. == Cast and characters == * Hayley Atwell as Peggy Carter * James D'Arcy as Edwin Jarvis * Chad Michael Murray as Jack Thompson * Enver Gjokaj as Daniel Sousa * Shea Whigham as Roger Dooley == Episodes == == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:ABC network series Category:2015 American television series debuts Category:2016 American television series endings Category:Superhero television shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Agent Carter (TV series)
